responses: Hello! How can I assist you today?
Hi there! What can I help you with?
Greetings! Let me know how I can assist.
Goodbye! Have a great day!
See you later! Take care.
Bye! Feel free to reach out again.
I am Abhishek Ranjan, an AI intern at Soul AI and Altibbe Health Private Limited, currently pursuing my pre-final year in Computer Science and Engineering at MNIT Jaipur.
I am pursuing B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering at MNIT Jaipur with a CGPA of 8.78 (till the 5th semester).

patterns: Tell me about your professional experience
responses: I am currently working at Soul AI and Altibbe Health Private Limited as an AI intern. My work focuses on Generative AI models and LLM fine-tuning.

patterns: What programming languages do you know?
What technologies are you proficient in?
Tell me about your technical skills
responses: My skills include Python, JavaScript, Java, C++, R, C, React.js, Streamlit, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Generative AI, NLP, MySQL, and more.
I have received multiple awards, including 6th place at Devfolio Hackathon Reckon 5.0, 1st place in Blitzschlag 2023 Quiz, and several national-level quiz and debate championships.

patterns: How do you spend your free time?
responses: I enjoy coding, quizzing, and debating. I also actively participate in hackathons and technical challenges.

responses: I aim to excel in Artificial Intelligence and contribute to impactful projects in Generative AI and Machine Learning, leveraging my technical skills and innovative mindset.

responses: I have interned at Soul AI and Altibbe Health Private Limited, focusing on AI-driven projects and improving system efficiency.

patterns: What projects have you worked on?

responses: I have worked on several projects, including a Question Generator using LLMs, an IPL Management System, and optimizing Spiking Neural Networks for pattern recognition.
